transferOwnership.title: Transfer Ownership
transferOwnership.description: Transfer ownership of the EventHub platform to another user. This action will:
descriptionBullets: Remove all your roles and assign you the "SeniorAdmin" role
Grant the selected user the "Owner" role
Log the transfer in activity logs
transferOwnership.accessControlDescription: You are entering the ownership transfer section. Please confirm your identity via Telegram to proceed with this critical operation.
transferOwnership.accessGranted: Access granted! You can now proceed with ownership transfer.
transferOwnership.invalidCode: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
transferOwnership.warningText: This action is irreversible and will immediately transfer all administrative privileges. Make sure you trust the selected user completely.
transferOwnership.selectNewOwnerDescription: Choose a user to transfer ownership to. Only users with administrative roles are recommended.
transferOwnership.confirmTransferText: Are you sure you want to transfer ownership to
transferOwnership.verificationCodeSent: A verification code has been sent to your Telegram. You'll need to enter it to complete the transfer.
transferOwnership.enterCodeText: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your Telegram to complete the ownership transfer to

organizer.dashboardDescription: Manage your events and track their performance.
organizer.createFirstEvent: Create your first event to get started.

profile.title: Profile

profile.updateFailed: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
profile.connectionError: Failed to update profile. Please check your connection and try again.
profile.notificationsDescription: Get notifications before events you are planning to attend and when you manage your favorite/planned list.

footer.description: Your platform for discovering, planning, and attending local events.
footer.contactSupport: We'd love to hear from you! Contact our support team at

missionDescription: EventHub is a platform designed to bring people together through events. We believe in the power of shared experiences and want to make it easy for people to discover, plan, and attend events that matter to them.
eventDiscoveryDescription: Browse through a wide range of events happening near you, filtered by category, location, and date.
socialEngagementDescription: Comment on events, react with emojis, and connect with other attendees who share your interests.
easyPlanningDescription: Mark events as favorites or plan to attend with just a click, and keep track of your upcoming events.
forOrganizersDescription: EventHub provides powerful tools for event organizers to create, promote, and manage their events:
organizerFeatures: Simple event creation with all the details attendees need
Communication tools to keep attendees informed
Moderation features to maintain a positive community
joinCommunityDescription: Whether you're looking for events to attend or wanting to host your own, EventHub is the perfect platform to connect, engage, and create memorable experiences. Sign up today and start discovering events that match your interests!
